answers.answer: Hi,How old are you ?Are you male or female?Would you be able to elaborate more on this face rash?Do you have any previous allergies?What could have triggered the onset of this face rash?Is the rash associated with any food intake or use of any medications ?Do you have any underlying disease like diabetes or kidney problems?If you have any history of previous allergies , I suggest that you seek immediate consult in case this is an allergic reaction.Keep us posted with your answers as this will clarify some points.
